    IPProtocol getIPProtocol()  
    cz.praguecityuniversity.NetworkAdapter getNetworkAdapter​(Device device)
    Gets either ethernet network adapter or wireless network adapter.
    Event handleEvent​(Event event, EventLogger logger)
    Redirects event to the chosen network adapter and sets the correct port interface trough which the event will be sent by the network adapter.

  • Method Details

    • getIPProtocol

      public IPProtocol getIPProtocol()

    • getNetworkAdapter

      public cz.praguecityuniversity.NetworkAdapter getNetworkAdapter​(Device device)
      Gets either ethernet network adapter or wireless network adapter.
      Parameters:
      device -
      Returns:
      Returns ethernet network adapter if one of the defined port interfaces has a cabled connection, otherwise wireless network adapter.

    • handleEvent

      public Event handleEvent​(Event event, EventLogger logger) throws EventFinished
      Redirects event to the chosen network adapter and sets the correct port interface trough which the event will be sent by the network adapter. Also, it adds delay simulating passing of time.
      Parameters:
      event - Event
      logger - Logger for logging information related to event handling
      Returns:
      Returns handled event
      Throws:
      EventFinished - Thrown when the event is finished on the device
